luxuryMedicalSpaDesignWorkflow.name: luxury-medical-spa-design-workflow
luxuryMedicalSpaDesignWorkflow.description: Complete workflow for creating luxury medical spa UI/UX designs with guaranteed consistency across all deliverables using UI/UX Design Agent

objectives.primary: Create cohesive luxury medical spa experience designs that maintain 100% brand consistency across all pages using UI/UX Design Agent
objectives.secondary: Ensure every design reflects premium positioning, medical professionalism, and consultation-focused journeys
objectives.tertiary: Deliver immersive storytelling experiences that eliminate ecommerce patterns and emphasize artistry over transactions

brandPositioning.luxuryMedicalSpa: Affluent clients seeking premium aesthetic services
brandPositioning.consultationDriven: Guide toward personalized consultations rather than immediate purchases
brandPositioning.sophisticatedAesthetics: Calming, premium visual appeal with generous whitespace

experienceDesign.immersiveStorytelling: Create anticipation through narrative rather than pricing
experienceDesign.subtleDiscovery: Progressive information disclosure without overwhelming CTAs
experienceDesign.artistryShowcase: Present treatments as medical artistry rather than services
experienceDesign.trustBuilding: Emphasize credentials, safety, and personalized care
experienceDesign.premiumSpacing: Luxury feel through sophisticated visual hierarchy

prohibitedPatterns.ecommerceElements: No pricing on cards, comparison grids, or shop-like layouts
prohibitedPatterns.transactionalLanguage: Avoid 'buy now', 'add to cart', or sales-focused copy
prohibitedPatterns.masMarketApproach: No generic medical spa or beauty salon aesthetics
prohibitedPatterns.complexFiltering: Avoid overwhelming filter systems or search complexity
prohibitedPatterns.aggressiveCTAs: No multiple CTAs competing for attention on single components

stage1BrandAlignmentValidation.description: Validate design requirements against luxury medical spa brand principles

validationChecks.brandPositioning: Ensure luxury positioning over mass market approach
validationChecks.consultationFocus: Verify consultation-driven rather than transactional approach
validationChecks.prohibitedPatterns: Check for and eliminate ecommerce/mass market elements

stage2DesignSystemConsistency.description: Ensure all designs follow established luxury medical spa design system

consistencyChecks.colorPalette: Verify Sage Green (#87A96B), Gold (#D4AF37), Medical Navy (#1B365D) usage
consistencyChecks.typography: Confirm Playfair Display + Inter luxury hierarchy
consistencyChecks.components: Ensure component library consistency across all designs

stage3ImmersiveExperienceDesign.description: Create immersive luxury experiences using UI/UX Design Agent storytelling capabilities

experiencePatterns.heroExperiences: Immersive storytelling with parallax and premium imagery
experiencePatterns.treatmentDiscovery: Artistic category presentation without pricing focus

contentApproach.artistryShowcase: Present treatments as medical art forms

stage4AccessibilityLuxuryIntegration.description: Integrate WCAG AAA accessibility as luxury feature using UI/UX Design Agent accessibility expertise

accessibilityAsLuxury.contrastExcellence: 11.5:1 contrast ratios as premium quality indicator
accessibilityAsLuxury.sophisticatedFocus: Custom focus indicators with luxury brand colors
accessibilityAsLuxury.screenReaderElegance: Semantic structure for inclusive premium experience
accessibilityAsLuxury.motorAccessibility: Generous touch targets (56px) as luxury spacing

wcagAAARequirements.colorContrast: 11.5:1 minimum ratio for all text elements
wcagAAARequirements.keyboardNavigation: Full keyboard accessibility with custom focus indicators
wcagAAARequirements.screenReaderSupport: Comprehensive ARIA labels and semantic markup
wcagAAARequirements.motorAccessibility: Large touch targets and accessible interactions
wcagAAARequirements.cognitiveAccessibility: Clear information architecture and simple navigation

stage5CrossPageConsistencyValidation.description: Validate consistency across all page designs using UI/UX Design Agent pattern recognition

consistencyChecks.visualLanguage: Consistent luxury aesthetic across all pages
consistencyChecks.navigationPatterns: Uniform navigation and user flow patterns
consistencyChecks.trustElements: Consistent credibility and trust signal placement
consistencyChecks.consultationJourney: Coherent path to consultation across all touchpoints

crossPageValidation.homepage: Premium brand introduction and treatment discovery
crossPageValidation.treatments: Artistic category presentation without ecommerce patterns
crossPageValidation.individualTreatment: Medical artistry storytelling and consultation focus
crossPageValidation.aboutUs: Founder legacy and medical excellence narrative
crossPageValidation.contact: Sophisticated consultation invitation and premium contact experience

stage6StakeholderValidation.description: Present cohesive luxury design system to stakeholders for validation

stakeholderGroups.medicalSpaOwner: Business owner validation of luxury positioning
stakeholderGroups.boardCertifiedProviders: Medical professional validation of credibility presentation

presentationMaterials.designSystemOverview: Complete luxury medical spa design foundation
presentationMaterials.pageDesignShowcase: All page designs with consistency demonstration
presentationMaterials.accessibilityDemonstration: WCAG AAA compliance as luxury feature

technicalIntegration.wordPressSageCompatibility: Ensure designs work with Sage theme architecture
